title: Results: Sofia Gomez Villafañe and Alexey Vermeulen Win 2024 Big Sugar Gravel
content:
Melisa Rollins and Cecily Decker take second and third in the women's race, while Colby Simmons and Simen Nordahl Svendsen round out the men's podium.

Read the full article at Results: Sofia Gomez Villafañe and Alexey Vermeulen Win 2024 Big Sugar Gravel on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
